lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Dan Reynolds/Wayne Sermon/Ben McKee/Robin Fredriksson/Mattias Larsson/Justin Tranter/Daniel Platzman
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Dan Reynolds/Wayne Sermon/Ben McKee/Robin Fredriksson/Mattias Larsson/Justin Tranter/Daniel Platzman
[00:10.16]Will you hold the line
[00:12.15]When every one of them is giving up or giving in, tell me
[00:15.15]In this house of mine
[00:16.75]Nothing ever comes without a consequence or cost, tell me
[00:19.82]Will the stars align?
[00:22.01]Will heaven step in? Will it save us from our sin? Will it?
[00:24.56]Cause this house of mine stands strong
[00:28.02]That's the price you pay
[00:31.40]Leave behind your heartache, cast away
[00:36.04]Just another product of today
[00:40.82]Rather be the hunter than the prey
[00:45.59]And you're standing on the edge face up cause you're a
[00:48.31]Natural
[00:49.84]A beating heart of stone
[00:52.19]You gotta be so cold
[00:54.44]To make it in this world
[00:56.94]Yeah, you're a natural
[00:59.36]Living your life cutthroat
[01:01.71]You gotta be so cold
[01:04.04]Yeah, you're a natural
[01:08.06]Will somebody
[01:10.05]Let me see the light within the dark trees' shadows and
[01:12.87]What's happening?
[01:14.74]Lookin' through the glass find the wrong within the past knowing
[01:17.50]Oh, we are the youth
[01:19.53]Call out to the beast
[01:20.84]Not a word without the peace, facing
[01:22.49]A bit of the truth, the truth
[01:25.55]That's the price you pay
[01:29.06]Leave behind your heartache, cast away
[01:33.92]Just another product of today
[01:38.66]Rather be the hunter than the prey
[01:43.37]And you're standing on the edge face up cause you're a
[01:45.88]Natural
[01:47.32]A beating heart of stone
[01:49.84]You gotta be so cold
[01:52.12]To make it in this world
[01:54.46]Yeah, you're a natural
[01:56.83]Living your life cutthroat
[01:59.41]You gotta be so cold
[02:01.89]Yeah, you're a natural
[02:05.92]Deep inside me, I'm fading to black, I'm fading
[02:10.50]Took an oath by the blood of my hand, won't break it
[02:15.26]I can taste it, the end is upon us, I swear
[02:19.79]Gonna make it
[02:22.44]I'm gonna make it
[02:26.95]Natural
[02:28.26]A beating heart of stone
[02:30.53]You gotta be so cold
[02:32.90]To make it in this world
[02:35.40]Yeah, you're a natural
[02:37.80]Living your life cutthroat
[02:40.12]You gotta be so cold
[02:42.67]Yeah, you're a natural
[02:53.59]Natural
[03:02.14]Yeah, you're a natural
tlyric:
[by:IPll4]
[00:10.16]你依旧坚持着
[00:12.15]当大家都已经放弃双手一摊时，告诉我
[00:15.15]在这间房子里
[00:16.75]没有任何一件事不需要代价或是给个结果，告诉我
[00:19.82]星星会成为一直线吗?
[00:22.01]天堂会离我们更近一步吗？可以拯救我们所犯下的一切吗？会吗
[00:24.56]这栋房子，依旧屹立不摇
[00:28.02]这是你所要付的代价
[00:31.40]让你那些奇奇怪怪的毛病滚吧
[00:36.04]那只不过每天每天辛勤后的产物
[00:40.82]宁愿成为一个猎人，也不要成为猎物
[00:45.59]你正站在边缘，面对现实吧，你拥有着
[00:48.31]天赋
[00:49.84]有着毅力不摇的心
[00:52.19]你必须学会冷酷、坚定
[00:54.44]在世上发挥你的才能
[00:56.94]是啊，你拥有天生的才能
[00:59.36]不择手段的过好自己的生活
[01:01.71]你必须学会冷酷
[01:04.04]因为你是个天才
[01:08.06]会有一个人
[01:10.05]让我在漆黑的摇曳树影间看见光芒吗？
[01:12.87]发生了什么事？
[01:14.74]从那玻璃的折射中寻找着过去已知的错误
[01:17.50]我们是如此的年轻
[01:19.53]大声喊叫像只野兽
[01:20.84]而不是和平，面对一切吧
[01:22.49]在你眼前的事实，事实
[01:25.55]这是你所要付的代价
[01:29.06]让你那些奇奇怪怪的毛病滚吧
[01:33.92]那只不过每天每天辛勤后的产物
[01:38.66]宁愿成为一个猎人，也不要成为猎物
[01:43.37]你正站在边缘，面对现实吧，你拥有着
[01:45.88]天赋
[01:47.32]有着毅力不摇的心
[01:49.84]你必须学会冷酷、坚定
[01:52.12]在世上发挥你的才能
[01:54.46]是啊，你拥有天生的才能
[01:56.83]不择手段的过好自己的生活
[01:59.41]你必须学会冷酷
[02:01.89]因为你是个天才
[02:05.92]在我的内心深处，我总是不断的没入黑暗
[02:10.50]用沾满鲜血的双手立下自己的誓言，永不打破
[02:15.26]我感觉得到，我发誓，世界的结局就在我们手上
[02:19.79]我必须做到
[02:22.44]我必须让一切成真
[02:26.95]天赋
[02:28.26]有着毅力不摇的心
[02:30.53]你必须学会冷酷、坚定
[02:32.90]在世上发挥你的才能
[02:35.40]是啊，你拥有天生的才能
[02:37.80]不择手段的过好自己的生活
[02:40.12]你必须学会冷酷
[02:42.67]因为你是个天才
[02:53.59]天赋
[03:02.14]你拥有天赋
